description:
Introducing PayLater – Your Ultimate Buy Now, Pay Later Solution!
Take control of your shopping experience with PayLater, the smarter way to shop. Whether it’s for everyday essentials or big purchases, PayLater lets you split your payments into easy, flexible installments – with no hidden fees.

Key Features:
Flexible Payment Options: Shop now and pay later with 4 equal instalments
Fast and Easy Onboarding: Get started in minutes with simple KYC and approval processes.
Secure Transactions: Enjoy peace of mind with PCI DSS-compliant payment security.
Merchant Network: Shop with top retailers like Lulu, Fnac, and many more.

Why Choose PayLater?
Transparent Fees: No hidden charges – what you see is what you pay.
Convenient and Local: All transactions are local, ensuring faster and safer processing.

Start Shopping Smarter Today!
Download PayLater now and join thousands of shoppers making smarter, more flexible payment decisions.

Commercial Bank Mobile Banking Services 
******************************************************************** 
Commercial Bank Mobile Banking offers customers quick access to their bank accounts, loans and credit cards. Available 24/7, allows you to check balances, pay bills and transfer money between own accounts and to local banks. Provides flexibility to transfer funds internationally within 60 seconds and supports faster remittances to over 40 countries. 
AROUND THE CLOCK, AROUND THE GLOBE 
---------------------------------------------------- 
Get instant access to your accounts through your mobile phone whenever and wherever you choose. 
FULLY SECURE 
-------------------
Commercial Bank Mobile Banking uses state of the art security measures. We have added new security measures in the app’s latest version in line with Qatar Central Bank’s regulations. For our users’ convenience, we have provided an option on screen to enter a mobile number if they have trouble receiving the SMS, this can be an international number. 
The new CBsafe ID feature introduced within the Mobile App provides additional security protecting customers from fraudulent calls. 
Using the CBQ Mobile App, you will be able to identify legitimate calls from the Bank, ensure caller authenticity and reduce the chances of fraudsters gaining access to your information. 

FEATURES 
--------------
* Register for fingerprint/ face ID 
* View your account balances and transactions 
* Check your credit card and loan balances 
* Customise your main dashboard and personalise your account and card names 
*Open additional accounts in various currencies 
*Subscribe to e-statements 
*Enable Voice activation 
*Manage Font settings 
*Early loan settlement 
*Generate IBAN letters and Digitally Signed Statements 
*60 second funds transfer including Faster remittances to over 40 countries that includes bank account transfers, wallet transfers and instant cash pickup services 
* Pay your credit cards bills 
* Enquire & Pay your Ooredoo and Vodafone bills online 
* Purchase Ooredoo and Vodafone prepaid services (Hala Topups, Hala vouchers etc.) 
* Pay your Merchant bills (Schools, Clubs, Insurance, and many more…) 
* Perform Merchant payments using QR Codes including P2M payments. 
* Mobile Payment Request - Request payment from another CB customer 
*Make Charity payments 
* Pay Kahramaa and Qatar Cool bills 
*Setup Apple Pay and perform card tokenization for Tap n Pay 
* Setup standing orders 
* Send an e-gift – Surprise your friends and family with an e-gift on special occasions 
* Mobile cash – Send cash to any mobile number within Qatar and withdraw the funds from any CB ATM without using an ATM card. 
*mPay services – Perform P2P and P2M payments instantly 
* Dispute credit or debit transactions 
* Update your personal profile 
*Buy now pay later – Convert your credit card transactions to instalments 
* Create new PIN for your debit and credit cards 
* Activate, Block your cards temporary and permanently 
* Cash advance from credit card - transfer money from your credit card to your account 
* Share IBAN with family and friends 
*Import QR code to quickly create beneficiaries for local transfers 
* Manage transfer limits - increase or decrease your daily online limits within local banks, between CB accounts and within your own accounts. 
*View credit card pend pattern 
*Redeem your reward points instantly 
*Setup your online travel plan 
* Locate CB card offers near you using augmented reality 
*Household Services – create a new PayCard account for your employee, transfer their salary and transfer funds directly from your account to your employee’s beneficiary. 
*Add mobile numbers of your add-on card holders 
Commercial Bank website: 
www.cbq.qa 
Write to us: Digital@cbq.qa

Enjoy doing more with QIB Mobile app. Available 24/7, QIB Mobile allows you to access all your accounts, check your finance status, perform many activities on your cards, transfer money locally and internationally, pay for your utility bills and more. 
QIB Mobile is available to all QIB Individual customers with an active ATM Card and PIN. As soon as you download and install the application, you can create your username and password to enjoy a seamless banking experience.
 
FEATURES
·         Login using your Touch ID
·         View all your current and saving accounts and fixed deposits
·         Check the status of your finance
·         Check the status of your investments
·         View accounts transaction history
·         Transfer funds within locally and internationally
·         View all your debit, charge and credit cards, settle early payments, view transactions history, activate/deactivate your cards and enable cards’ Magnetic stripe for international use
·         View and Pay your bills/Top up Ooredoo, Vodafone and Kahramaa
·         Locate the nearest QIB Branch or ATM and book a visit to meet your teller or Customer Service representative
·         Check foreign currency exchange rates
·         Update your contact details
 
SECURITY AND PRIVACY
QIB Mobile Banking is secure and safe. We have introduced the two factor authentication using the One-Time-Password authentication (OTP) to further secure your banking account. OTP will be received either by SMS to your registered mobile number or by downloading QIB Aman app to be used upon logging in to your account and upon performing a banking transaction.
Your account information is not and will not be stored anywhere on your device. We have also implemented the latest security technologies. We are committed to your privacy and account details safety. See our online privacy policy on www.qib.com.qa
 
CONTACT US
We are there to help you 24/7. You can contact us through email
Mobilebanking@qib.com.qa
or call our Contact Center on 4444 8444 for further assistance

A simple, secure and easy way to stay connected with your money via Ooredoo network. Ooredoo Mobile Money (OMM) app is a free app that offers a convenient means to send money, buy airtime, make payments and manage your money account. You can access free cash deposits, save and send your money safely and withdraw cash from any QNB ATM. We offer you one of the best exchange rates with a competitive fee, for sending money to over 198 countries from Qatar.

Tomorrow’s digital banking, today. A seamless and innovative banking experience with QNB. Customize how you want to display your accounts, manage your credit cards and quickly pay your most common payments from the dashboard. Transfers funds internationally with competitive exchange rates and make same day transfers (including Ripple and Western Union etc.). Manage and pay your bills easily. Access your local & international accounts, apply for and manage your personal and vehicle loans. View our Life Rewards partners and redeem your loyalty points, view interest and forex rates. Request cheque books, and easily find ATM-s for local and foreign currency withdrawals using our ATM/Video teller, and branch locator, an apply for QNB products. Moreover, you can use contactless payments, card less ATM services, deposit cheques, register & subscribe for IPO, chat online with one of QNB agents at any time if need our help.
You can login with your QNB Mobile and Internet Banking user name and password, or if you forgot your credentials, you can securely reset through the App. If you have not registered yet, you can simply register selecting Register Now. If you are not yet a QNB customer, you still can enjoy many of our services.
 
You can update the App automatically by going to Settings/iTunes & App Store/Automatic Downloads.
 
For more information, please visit www.qnb.com/mobile

Use iPay for easy , secure , fast and convenient experience . You can do local transfer , international remittance , merchant and utility payment from this application.

Easy : Sign up with 3 easy steps in less than 60 seconds .

Secure : iPay app is secured with your biometrics and all your payments are SSL secured.

Fast : Quick transfer to family & friends anywhere in the world.

Convenient : Track progress of your requests and transfers in real time . We are at your service 24/7 if you need any help.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Introducing markets.com - For Traders By Traders. Sophisticated Forex, Stocks,Indices and commodities trading app. With an array of features and a user-friendly interface, this app is designed to cater to the needs of traders at every level of expertise.

Discover the diverse trading world with markets.com. Explore stocks, indices, commodities, and currencies seamlessly. Stay ahead with advanced charting tools and in-depth analysis, ensuring informed decisions at every turn complemented by fast withdrawals, secure deposits, and instant execution for a trading experience like no other

Proud milestone of markets.com:
Trading Volume: $3 Trillion
Users: 4.7M+
Partners: 11,700+
Partner Referrals/Users: 4M+
Commissions Paid: $184M+
Positions Opened: 68M+

Trade Futures with markets.com:
●  Fast reliable execution via robust centralized trading exchanges.
●  Competitive commissions.
●  Low minimum deposit.
●  Industry-leading trading platforms & Free mobile app (multi-language).
●  Tailored solutions for high-volume traders.

Why Choose markets.com?
●  Superior Trading Conditions: Trade a vast array of instruments with spreads as low as 0.0 pips and enjoy some of the industry's most competitive commissions.
●  Ultra-Fast Execution: Experience one of the fastest execution times in the industry – averaging just 0.20 seconds, with no requotes.
●  All Trading Strategies Allowed: Trade global financial markets using virtually any strategy, including hedging.
●  Safety of Client Funds: Your funds are securely held in segregated accounts with top-tier banks, and Negative Balance Protection is offered for all accounts.
●  Pioneering Technology: Our trading platforms are driven by innovative technology and advanced features, continually meeting the evolving needs of our clients.
●  Dedicated Support: Access expert support from our multilingual team of professionals to ensure timely assistance.

Experience the pinnacle of trading with markets.com – a global leader since 2008. Our innovative platforms, advanced charting, and unwavering support have attracted over 4.7M+ users worldwide. As a top CFDs trading brand, we operate in multiple jurisdictions, delivering excellence through cutting-edge technology and a commitment to your success markets.com is a global trading platform, and operated in the following jurisdictions and under these entities:

Europe (Cyprus) - Safecap Investments Limited, regulated by CySEC under license no. 092/08.
●  Australia - Finalto (Australia) Pty Limited, regulated by ASIC under license no. 424008.
●  Africa - Finalto (South Africa) PTY LTD regulated by FSCA under license no. 46860 and licensed to operate as an Over The Counter Derivatives Provider (ODP) in terms of the Financial Markets Act no. 19 of 2012.
●  Global - Finalto (BVI) Limited, regulated by FSC under license no. SIBA/L/14/1067.
●  UK - Finalto Financial Services Limited, regulated by FCA under license no. 481853. Spread bets are only available to UK clients.
●  Finalto International Limited (FinaltoSVG) is registered  in the Saint Vincent and The Grenadines (“SVG”) under the revised Laws of Saint Vincent and The Grenadines 2009, with registration number  27030 BC 2023.

CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 74-89% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs. You should consider whether you understand CFDs and your risk before investing.

AlRayan Go is the new Mobile Banking application for AlRayan Bank that provides its customers with a wide variety of banking services such as Account Services, Transfer, Card Management, and many more

Get access to all Qatar Credit Bureau services within a glance!
Features: 
⁃ Fully integrated with Qatar national authentication system (NAS)
⁃ Access your credit report instantly (For both consumer and commercial products)
⁃ Raise and follow-up your disputes to correct your data 
⁃ Approve or reject your credit report requests through E-Approvals system
⁃ See your inquiries history and download your credit report anytime 
⁃ Pay your credit report fees securely by your credit or debit cards  


تطبيق مركز قطر للمعلومات الائتمانية يتيح لكم وصول مباشر لكافة خدمات المركز الإلكترونية

المميزات:
⁃ ربط كامل مع نظام التوثيق الوطني 
⁃ احصل على تقريرك الائتماني في لحظات (متاح لمنتجات الافراد والشركات) 
⁃ رفع ومتابعة الشكاوي المتعلقة بتصحيح البيانات
⁃ قبول او رفض طلبات مراجعة التقرير الائتماني عبر نظام الموافقات الالكترونية 
⁃ مراجعة سجل استعلاماتك السابقة 
⁃ الدفع الالكتروني الامن لرسوم التقارير الائتمانية عبر البطاقات الائتمانية وبطاقات الخصم

Thousands of clients from over 55 countries have started their journey with us. You too can put your money to work.

Wahed is the easiest way to invest your money in an Ethical manner wherever you are. You can start with just $100 with no long-term commitments whatsoever. You can place a deposit or withdrawal request at anytime.

Here’s how it works:

1. Get a recommended portfolio based on your risk profile
2. Open your account and deposit seamlessly
3. Monitor your performance, we’ll buy the investments for you automatically

Start saving for your future with this award winning and revolutionary digital Ethical investment platform - your phone becomes an investment portfolio management tool.

Wahed’s robo-advisor custom tailors recommendations based on a simple risk assessment questionnaire with one main purpose: finding the right investment strategy for you! Your money will be invested in different funds such as global stocks, emerging market stocks, Sukuk, and gold.

Commitment to Ethical investing:

• Our investments are carefully screened for the presence of interest, as well securities with excessive debt ratios
• We do not invest in impermissible industries including alcohol, gambling, arms and tobacco, among others
• Our company and portfolios have been certified as Shariah Compliant by AAOIFI standards by our full time Shariah Review Board

Signing up is easy. Download our app, take the risk assessment questionnaire and make your deposit to join thousands of clients who are investing for their future.

Introducing the Alfardan Exchange Send Money Application

Welcome to the Alfardan Exchange application, your all-in-one solution for seamless financial transactions. With just a few clicks, you can effortlessly manage your money and enjoy a suite of powerful features designed for your convenience.

Transfer Money Effortlessly: Send money quickly and securely with just a few taps on your screen.
Purchase Foreign Currency: Buy foreign currencies easily and have them delivered right to your doorstep.
Purchase High Purity Gold Bars and Coins: Invest in high purity gold bars and gold coins, with delivery directly to you.

Experience the ultimate convenience and efficiency in financial services. Register now and discover the Alfardan Exchange Send Money Application difference.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

With the Western Union mobile app, you can send money abroad at the best exchange rates. Make online transfers to 200 countries and territories^ around the world via our app, hassle-free.

Here’re the key features of Western Union app:

•	Three-step customer registration
•	Easy biometric login to access your profile 
•	Convenient online ID verification process 
•	Transfer money in minutes** using your debit card issued in Qatar.
•	Quick resend option for repeat transfers
•	Track your transfer status in just a click
•	Share transaction details with receivers via WhatsApp, email, SMS, etc.
•	Get transfer updates via SMS and emails 
•	Prompt customer support for your questions
•	Access the application in Arabic language
•	Check current fees*and exchange rates instantly
•	Save receivers details to resend money easily 
•	Ability to resume incomplete transfers
•	Find nearby agent locations

Download the app now and transfer your money safely with us. For more details, visit westernunion.com.
^ Network Data as of September 30, 2017.

* Western Union also makes money from currency exchange. When choosing a money transmitter, carefully compare both transfer fees and exchange rates. Fees and foreign exchange rates may vary by brand, channel, and location based on a number of factors. Fees and rates subject to change without notice. Subject to applicable taxes (if any). FX gains apply.  

**Funds may be delayed or services unavailable based on certain transaction conditions, including amount sent, destination country, currency availability, regulatory and foreign exchange issues, required receiver action(s), identification requirements, Agent location hours, differences in time zones, or selection of delayed options. Additional Restrictions may apply.

When you send money with Western Union, you get great rates for senders and no fees for recipients. Send a money transfer home to your recipient’s bank or mobile money provider or in cash. 

Western Union has offices around the world and is headquartered in Denver, 7001 E. Belleview, Denver, CO 80237.

Do you have questions about our services? Contact one of our nearby Western Union agent location. Use our agent location finder to find one nearby or call our service centre tel:+17203321000.

Additional third-party charges may apply.

SHOP NOW. PAY LATER
Tabby lets you shop what you love and split purchases into four monthly payments — with no interest, no hidden fees and no surprises. Whether you're shopping online or in store, Tabby gives you control, financial flexibility and peace of mind.

SHOP FROM TOP BRANDS
Discover and shop your favorite brands including AMAZON, SHEIN, IKEA, ADIDAS, SIVVI, CENTREPOINT, and many more in one shopping app. The Tabby app is your one-stop shopping destination, packed with fashion, electronics, home goods, makeup, and more.

COMPARE PRICES & SAVE MONEY
Track price drops and compare products across multiple stores. With smart alerts, you’ll always get the best deal — your personal price-checker, built right in.

NEW DEALS AND DISCOUNTS EVERY DAY
Shop daily discounts, coupons and promotions from top brands. Never miss a deal — just open the app and see what’s new.

FIND NEARBY STORES THAT ACCEPT TABBY
Use our in-store map to discover shops and malls that accept Tabby. Try before you buy and still pay later. Search by brand, category or location.

ONE APP FOR ALL YOUR SHOPPING
Manage payments, track purchases, get reminders and explore new brands — all in one app.

PROTECT YOUR PURCHASE WITH TABBY CARE
Tabby Care adds extra peace of mind. It covers your purchases, makes returns easy and protects your order every step of the way.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use chat in the Tabby app for round-the-clock support.

Tabby gives you the freedom to pay later with no interest, no fees and no surprises — so you can shop on your terms.

Follow us to stay up-to-date on new stores and latest deals:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tabbypay/

X: https://x.com/paywithtabby/

Need help? Reach out to http://help.tabby.ai/

PhonePe is a payments app that allows you to use BHIM UPI, your credit card and debit card or wallet to recharge your mobile phone, pay all your utility bills and to make instant payments at your favourite offline and online stores. You can also invest in mutual funds and buy insurance plans on PhonePe. Get Car & Bike Insurance on our app.
Link your bank account on PhonePe and transfer money with BHIM UPI instantly! The PhonePe app is safe and secure, meets all your payment, investment, mutual funds, insurance and banking needs, and is much better than Internet banking.

Things you can do on PhonePe (Phonepay) App:

Money Transfer, UPI Payment, Bank Transfer
- Money Transfer with BHIM UPI
- Manage Multiple Bank Accounts – Check Account Balance, Save Beneficiaries across multiple bank accounts like SBI, HDFC, ICICI & 140+ banks.

Make Online Payments
- Make online payment on various shopping sites like Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra etc.
- Pay for online food orders from Zomato, Swiggy etc.
- Pay for online grocery orders from Bigbasket, Grofers etc.
- Pay online for travel booking from Makemytrip, Goibibo etc.

Make Offline Payments
- Scan and Pay via QR Code at local stores like kirana, food, medicines etc.

Buy or Renew Insurance Policies with PhonePe Insurance App

Health & Term Life Insurance
- Compare and buy Health & Term life Insurance with monthly premiums
- Coverage for individuals, senior citizens and families

Car & Two Wheeler Insurance
- Browse and get India’s most popular bike and car insurance
- Buy/renew your car and bike Insurance in less than 10 minutes

Other Insurance
- Personal Accident Insurance: Insure yourself against accidents & disablement
- Travel Insurance: Get international travel insurance for business and leisure trips
- Shop Insurance: Insure your shop against fire, theft, natural calamities, and burglaries.

Mutual Funds App and Investments App
- Liquid Funds: Get higher returns than savings bank 
- Tax-Saving Funds: save up to Rs. 46,800 in tax & grow your investment
- Super Funds: Achieve financial goals with expert help on our app 
- Equity Funds: High growth products curated as per risk appetite
- Debt Funds: Get stable returns for investments without any lock-in period
- Hybrid Funds: Get a balance of growth and stability 
- Buy or Sell 24K Pure Gold: Assured 24K purity, build gold savings on our app

Recharge Mobile, DTH
- Prepaid Mobile Recharge, DTH
- Recharge for Airtel, Jio, Vi, BSNL and MTNL prepaid mobile numbers
- Recharge DTH set-top boxes for TataPlay, Airtel Digital TV, Sun Direct, Dish TV and D2H providers.

Bill Payment
- Pay Credit Card Bills
- Pay Landline Bills
- Pay Electricity Bills
- Pay Water Bills
- Pay Gas Bills
- Pay Broadband Bills

Buy PhonePe Gift Cards
- Buy a PhonePe Gift Card for easy payments across 1 lakh+ leading offline and online outlets and across the PhonePe app.

Manage your refunds
- Manage and track refunds from your favorite shopping websites on PhonePe.
For more details, Visit our website at https://www.phonepe.com/

Permissions for App and reasons
SMS: to verify Phone number for registration
Location: a requirement by NPCI for UPI transactions
Contacts: for phone numbers to send money to and numbers to recharge
Camera: to scan QR code
Storage: to store scanned QR code
Accounts: to pre-populate email ID while signing up
Call: to detect single vs dual sim and let user choose
Microphone: to carry out KYC video verification

Capital.com: Trade derivatives on stocks, indices, gold and more

Discover a user-friendly app for trading built to help you go long or short on thousands of markets. Join over 750,000 users worldwide who choose Capital.com as their trusted broker, and trade derivatives without investing outright in assets on an Online Investments app.

Access financial markets and stay informed with real-time news – all from one secure platform for trading. Seamless integrations with TradingView and MetaTrader 4.

Choose from 4,800+ global markets

Explore a wide range of asset types including:
- Equities, eg stocks and shares
- Indices: eg US 100, UK 100 
- Commodities: eg gold, oil, gas 

Track the stock market and movements of share price across thousands of instruments.

Key features to support your trading

Investing in your trading journey: our platform offers tools that adapt to your strategy.
- Analysis tools
- Price alerts 
- Risk-management tools
- Market updates
- Demo account
- Access to TradingView and MetaTrader 4
- Zero fees on deposits and withdrawals*
- Multiple payment methods (varies by region)

Learn while you trade

- Guides to trading derivatives and understanding equities 
- Video tutorials, to help you build confidence and trade
- Market explainers, insights into share price and guidance on trading and analysing stocks over time
- Stock Exchange insights

Support when you need it

As a regulated broker, Capital.com helps you navigate the commodity and stock markets. Our expert support team is available 24/7 in English. Support is available in 10 languages.

Our app gives you the tools to trade, whether you're analysing the stock exchange, exploring commodities like gold and oil, or reacting to market news.

Award-winning platform
- 4.8 stars on Investing.com
- Best Trading Account (People’s Choice) 2025 – Good Money Guide
- Best Overall Trading Platform 2024 – Online Money Awards

Designed for anyone interested in the stock market – from beginners to seasoned traders.

Risk warning

Leveraged products are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Depending on the company, between 64%–82.78% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading leveraged products with Capital.com Group. You should consider whether you understand how these products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

Licences and regulation

Capital Com Online Investments Ltd. is a company incorporated in the Bahamas with registration number 209236B, authorised by the Securities Commission of The Bahamas (SCB) as a Registered Firm to carry on Securities Business under licence number SIA-F245.

CAPITAL COM MENA SECURITIES TRADING L.L.C is a company registered in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, and authorised by the Securities and Commodities Authority (SCA) under licence number 20200000176. Registered office: Jumeirah Emirates Towers, Emirates Towers Offices, Level L14, Unit 14C, Dubai, UAE.
Capital.com is regulated by the SCA. Over-the-counter leveraged derivative contracts, carry a high degree of risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. Trading over-the-counter leveraged derivatives may not be suitable for all investors. Before engaging in any trading activities, you should carefully consider your investment objectives, risk tolerance, and financial situation. Please seek independent financial advice before trading if necessary.

*Other fees apply.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

इसेवा नेपालकै पहिलो मोबाइल खाता हो । इसेवामा खाता खोली आफ्नै मोबाइलबाट नि:शुल्क आफ्नो मोबाइल रिचार्ज, घरको बिजुली, खानेपानी, टेलिफोन, इन्टरनेट आदिको बिल भुक्तानी गरि मासिक रु ५०० देखि रु २००० सम्म बचत गर्नुहोस् । 

इसेवा कसरी प्रयोग गर्ने ? 

रजिष्ट्रेशन
इसेवाको App Download गरि Register गर्नुहोस् । यसरी Register गर्दा तपाँईको मोबाइल नम्बर नै तपाँइको इसेवा आइडी हुनेछ ।

इसेवामा पैसा जम्मा गर्न
इसेवामा चार प्रकारबाट सजिलै रकम जम्मा गर्न सकिन्छ:

१. इन्टरनेट वा मोबाइल बैंकिङ मार्फत
बैंकको खाताबाट इन्टरनेट वा मोबाइल बैंकिङ मार्फत इसेवामा नि:शुल्क रकम जम्मा गर्नुहोस। मोबाइल/इन्टरनेट बैंकिङ सेवा लिनु भएको छैन भने आजै आफ्नो बैंक को शाखामा गएर सेवा सुरु गराउनुहोस ।

२. काउण्टर डिपोजिट मार्फत
इसेवाको पार्टनर बैंक मध्ये ७ वटा बैंकबाट इसेवामा काउण्टर डिपोजिट पनि गर्न सकिन्छ । 

ग्लोबल आइएमई बैंक,
प्रभु बैंक, 
महालक्ष्मी डेभेलपमेन्ट बैंक, 
जनता बैंक,
मेगा बैंक 
ओम डेभेलपमेन्ट बैंक
कामना सेवा विकास बैंक

३. eSewa Cash Point मार्फत
तपाँईको आफ्नो टोल छिमेकमा रहेका eSewa Cash Point चिन्ह अंकित इसेवाका एजेन्ट मार्फत पनि नि:शुल्क रकम जम्मा गर्नुहोस।

४. तपाँईले अन्य इसेवा प्रयोगकर्ताबाट इसेवामा पैसा राख्न र पठाउन पनि सक्नुहुन्छ ।

इसेवामा उपलब्ध सेवाहरु:
मोबाइल रिचार्ज र टपअप
ल्याण्डलाइन बिल
हवाइजहाज र बस टिकट
बिजुली र खानेपानीको बिल भुक्तानी
इन्टरनेटको बिल भुक्तानी
टेलिभिजन रिचार्ज
मुभि टिकट
होटल बुकिङ
स्कुल फि 
इन्सुरेन्स प्रिमियम
किस्ता भुक्तानी
डिम्याट खाता दर्ता र नविकरण
क्रेडिट कार्ड बिल भुक्तानी
अनलाइन सपिङ
बैंक डिपोजिट

इसेवाको बारेमाः
eSewa fonepay Pvt. Ltd. सन् २००९ बाट सेवा दिइरहेको नेपालको पहिलो भुक्तानी सेवा प्रदायक कम्पनि हो । मोबाइल तथा इन्टरनेट बैंकिङको सफ्टवेयर प्रदायक कम्पनिमा नेपालकै अग्रणी स्थानमा रहेको F1Soft International को एक सहायक कम्पनिको रुपमा इसेवा रहेको छ ।

हाल नेपालको ७७ वटै जिल्लामा पहुँच भएको यस eSewa fonepay Pvt. Ltd. सँग १० लाख भन्दा बढि दर्ता भएका ग्राहकहरु , ४०,००० भन्दा बढि व्यवसायी (eSewa Zone/Point), ४७ बैंकहरु तथा १,५०० भन्दा बढि मर्चेन्टहरु आवद्ध रहेका छन।

थप जानकारीका लागि: १६६०-०१-०२१२१
ईमेल: csd(@)esewa.com.np


eSewa is Nepal's first payment gateway with integrated digital wallet. You can register on-the-go and save Rs. 500 - Rs. 2000 in a month. 

How to register and make payment with eSewa? 
Registration
Download eSewa app and click on Register. Your mobile number will be your eSewa ID.

Load fund to eSewa
You can load fund to your eSewa account in 4 different ways:

1.	Via Mobile/Internet Banking:
You can load eSewa wallet from your internet/mobile banking without any additional cost from 47 banks. Visit your bank branch if you have not enabled internet banking and mobile banking.

2.	Via Counter Deposit:
You can visit nearest branch of below mentioned partner banks for loading fund to your eSewa account via counter deposit:
a. Global Bank
b. Prabhu Bank
c. Mahalaxmi Development Bank
d. Janata Bank
e. Mega Bank
f. OM Development Bank
g. Kamana Sewa Bikas Bank


3.	Via eSewa Cash Point
You can visit nearest eSewa Cash Point and load fund to your eSewa wallet without additional service charge.

4.	You can also send and receive fund to your eSewa wallet from other eSewa users for free.

Services of eSewa:
Mobile recharge and TOPUP
Landline Bill
Airline and Bus Ticket
Electricity and water bill payment
Internet Bill
Television Subscription
Movie Ticket
Hotel Booking
School Fee
Insurance Premium
EMI Payment
DMAT account opening and renew
Credit Card Bill
Online Shopping
Bank Deposit

About eSewa
eSewa Fonepay Pvt. Ltd. is the first and leading Payment Service Provider, starting service from 2009 AD. eSewa is a subsidiary company of F1Soft International, leading fin-tech company in Nepal.

eSewa has it's wider coverage to all the 77 districts of Nepal. eSewa has a growing network of more than 10 lakhs registered customer, 40,000+ agents (eSewa Zone/Point), 47 banks, 1500+ merchants.

Welcome to the all-new HDFC Bank App – your personal, secure, and seamless banking experience at your fingertips. Designed for convenience and efficiency, this App brings all your banking needs together in one place. 

Excited to try the all-new HDFC Bank App (Early Access)?  Write to us at support@hdfcbank.com and be among the first!

Key Features:

-Fast and Secure Login: Enjoy secure and quick access using facial recognition, fingerprint authentication, or a simple PIN for easy login. 

-Holistic Account Overview: View all your HDFC Bank accounts, term deposits, and credit card information in one place for easy access. 

-Flexible Savings Options: Manage your term-saving deposits or set up recurring plans with ease and flexibility. 

-Effortless Loan Applications: Apply for personal loans, home loans, or manage your credit card services directly from the app, all with a seamless application process. 

-Insure Your Future: Access a wide range of insurance options and manage your policies effortlessly within the app. From health to life insurance, ensure you and your loved ones are protected with a few taps. 

-Fast Fund Transfers via UPI: Transfer funds quickly and securely via UPI, IMPS, or NEFT. Send money instantly to any bank, anytime. 

-Convenient Bill Payments: Pay your electricity, gas, and other utility bills, or top up your mobile and satellite subscriptions easily within the app. 

-Multi-Layered Security: Stay protected with robust security features such as device linking and authentication, ensuring your banking experience is always safe. 

-Tailored Banking Insights: Get personalized financial insights and recommendations based on your banking behavior to help you manage your finances better. 

-Adjustable Themes: Choose between night and day mode to adjust your app's theme to suit your preferences, for a more comfortable experience.
